mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (idx, user_idx, title, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ( (SELECT 'BOARD-' || (COALESCE(MAX((SUBSTRING(idx FROM 7))::int), 0)+1) FROM board), #{userIdx}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT b.idx, b.user_idx AS userIdx, u.user_name AS userName, b.title, b.hit, b.content, b.created_at AS createdAt, b.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM board b JOIN "user" u ON b.user_idx = u.idx ORDER BY b.created_at DESC

SELECT b.idx, b.user_idx AS userIdx, u.user_name AS userName, b.title, b.hit, b.content, b.created_at AS createdAt, b.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM board b JOIN "user" u ON b.user_idx = u.idx WHERE b.idx = #{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE idx = #{idx}
